alluxio.worker.file

Interface FileSystemWorker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Server, Worker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFileSystemWorker

    public interface FileSystemWorker
extends Worker
    Interface representing a file system worker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelUfsFile(long sessionId, long tempUfsFileId)
      Cancels a file currently being written to the under file system.
      void closeUfsFile(long sessionId, long tempUfsFileId)
      Closes a file currently being read from the under file system.
      long completeUfsFile(long sessionId, long tempUfsFileId, Permission perm)
      Completes a file currently being written to the under file system.

      Creates a new file in the under file system.
      InputStream getUfsInputStream(long tempUfsFileId, long position)
      Opens a stream to the under file system file denoted by the temporary file id.
      OutputStream getUfsOutputStream(long tempUfsFileId)
      Returns the output stream to the under file system file denoted by the temporary file id.
      FileSystemWorkerClientServiceHandler getWorkerServiceHandler() 
      long openUfsFile(long sessionId, AlluxioURI ufsUri)
      Opens a file in the under file system and registers a temporary file id with the file.

      Registers a client's heartbeat to keep its session alive.

      • Methods inherited from interface alluxio.Server

        start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • cancelUfsFile

        void cancelUfsFile(long sessionId,
                   long tempUfsFileId)
            throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                   IOException
        Cancels a file currently being written to the under file system. The open stream will be closed and the partial file will be cleaned up.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the id of the file to cancel, only understood by the worker that created the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if this worker is not writing the specified file
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • closeUfsFile

        void closeUfsFile(long sessionId,
                  long tempUfsFileId)
           throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                  IOException
        Closes a file currently being read from the under file system. The open stream will be closed and the file id will no longer be valid.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the id of the file to close, only understood by the worker that opened the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker is not reading the specified file
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • completeUfsFile

        long completeUfsFile(long sessionId,
                     long tempUfsFileId,
                     Permission perm)
              throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                     IOException
        Completes a file currently being written to the under file system. The open stream will be closed and the partial file will be promoted to the completed file in the under file system.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        tempUfsFileId - the id of the file to complete, only understood by the worker that created the file
        perm - the permission of the file
        Returns:
        the length of the completed file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker is not writing the specified file
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • createUfsFile

        long createUfsFile(long sessionId,
                   AlluxioURI ufsUri,
                   Permission perm)
            throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                   IOException
        Creates a new file in the under file system. This will register a new stream in the under file system manager. The stream can only be accessed with the returned id afterward.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        ufsUri - the under file system uri to create a file for
        perm - the permission of the file
        Returns:
        the temporary worker specific file id which references the in-progress ufs file
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if a file already exists in the under file system with the same path
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • getUfsInputStream

        InputStream getUfsInputStream(long tempUfsFileId,
                              long position)
                       throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                              IOException
        Opens a stream to the under file system file denoted by the temporary file id. This call will skip to the position specified in the file before returning the stream. The caller of this method should not close this stream. Resources will automatically be cleaned up when closeUfsFile(long, long) is called.
        Parameters:
        tempUfsFileId - the worker specific temporary file id for the file in the under storage
        position - the absolute position in the file to position the stream at before returning
        Returns:
        an input stream to the ufs file positioned at the given position, null if the position is past the end of the file.
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the worker file id is invalid
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • getUfsOutputStream

        OutputStream getUfsOutputStream(long tempUfsFileId)
                         throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Returns the output stream to the under file system file denoted by the temporary file id. The stream should not be closed by the caller but through the cancelUfsFile(long,long) or the completeUfsFile(long, long, Permission) methods.
        Parameters:
        tempUfsFileId - the worker specific temporary file id for the file in the under storage
        Returns:
        the output stream writing the contents of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the temporary file id is invalid

      • getWorkerServiceHandler

        FileSystemWorkerClientServiceHandler getWorkerServiceHandler()
        Returns:
        the worker service handler

      • openUfsFile

        long openUfsFile(long sessionId,
                 AlluxioURI ufsUri)
          throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                 IOException
        Opens a file in the under file system and registers a temporary file id with the file. This id is valid until the file is closed.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the request
        ufsUri - the under file system path of the file to open
        Returns:
        the temporary file id which references the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist in the under file system
        IOException - if an error occurs interacting with the under file system

      • sessionHeartbeat

        void sessionHeartbeat(long sessionId)
        Registers a client's heartbeat to keep its session alive. The client can also piggyback metrics on this call. Currently there are no metrics collected from this call.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id to renew
